item.title: Rust Tutorial
item.description: 引用于： https://kaisery.github.io/trpl-zh-cn/title-page.html Notes Base 变量默认是不可改变的 immutable error[E0384]: cannot assign twice to immutable variable `x` --> src/main.rs:3:5 2 | let x = 1; | - | | | first assignment to `x` | help: consider making this binding mutable: `mut x` 3 | x = 6; | ^^^^^ cannot assign twice to immutable variable 例如,使用
